alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 2:47PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Tooele County through 315 PM MDT... At 247 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Delle, or 22 miles northwest of Grantsville, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Delle. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 63 and 75. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
